game.name: Spook Ltd.: Warashi Homes
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is the story of a modern Zashiki-warashi who visits a mysterious real estate agency in search of a home to haunt. Explore real apartments in Tokyo, uncover mischievous yokai disguised as everyday furniture and household items, and delve into the mysteries of Warashi Realty.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is the story of a modern Zashiki-warashi who visits a mysterious real estate agency in search of a home to haunt. Explore real apartments in Tokyo, uncover mischievous yokai disguised as everyday furniture and household items, and delve into the mysteries of Warashi Realty.
